https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aN39Qs675hQWFQpfebvWchlXVHT.jpg A tragic event on Greece's northern border confronts a Greek family of three to face personal impasses, with everyone having to reflect for the first time in their lives on the cost of their actions. Behind the Haystacks
